Title: The Awakening
Writer: Antonio Altoviti (story and writer), Siro Angeli, Vito Blasi, Mario Camerini, Piero De Bernardi, Ennio De Concini, Mario Guerra, Ugo Guerra, Amleto Micozzi, Aldo Paladini, Giose Rimanelli (story and written by), Virgilio Tosi, Cesare Zavattini (story and written by)
Actors: Anna Magnani, Emma Baron, Marisa Belli, Piero Boccia
Plot: A Roman nun who was a missionary in Africa for 20 years is sent to a convent near Naples where she grows very fond of a boy whose father has died. The child's mother is about to leave him to follow a worker she is in love with who has decided to emigrate to America.
